journal.title: Epizootiology, Immunobiology, Pharmacology, Sanitary Science : international scientific and practical journal

person.name: Zgirovskaya, A.A., National Academy of Sciences. Scientific and Practical Center of Animal Breding (Belarus). The S.N. Vyshelesskij Inst. of Experimental Veterinary Medicine

abstract.value: In the conditions of the Republic of Belarus there was presented results of research of life cycle of cell culture MARC-145 with allocation of separate phases are presented. There was realized the study of the life cycle of a cell culture MARC-145 with construction of a diagram reflecting individual cycle phases: latent, logarithmic, and stationary phases of aging. There was analyzed the dynamics of growth of MARC-145 cells and the main morphological and biological indicators of culture in the process of growth with photo documentation of the process. Dynamics of growth of cells and the basic morphology and biological parameters of culture is studied. By means of automatic analyzer 'Scepta' the analysis of cell population MARC-145 is carried out: the average size of diameter of cells has made 14,42 micrometer, and their volume – 1,58 pl, cell population is homogeneous.
